It has an area of . 2,580,626 people live there. The capital is Magdeburg. Some big cities and towns in Saxony-Anhalt are: * Bitterfeld-Wolfen * Dessau * Halberstadt * Halle * Wittenberg * Magdeburg (capital) * Merseburg * Naumburg (Saale) * Quedlinburg * Stendal * Weißenfels ==References==
